title: A genetic tree as a movie: Moving beyond the still portrait of ancestry
snippets: Researchers have developed a statistical method that allows individuals to view their family tree dynamically, illustrating the global migration of ancestors over time in a movie-like format. title: Cartilage and bone development: Three paths to skeleton formation
